sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import '../styles/Destinations.css'; import guangzhouImg from '../assets/广州.jpg'; const allDestinations = [ { id: 1, name: '北京', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1508804185872-d7badad00f7d', description: '探索中国历史文化的心脏', attractions: ['故宫', '长城', '天坛', '颐和园', '南锣鼓巷'], price: '3000', category: '文化游', bestSeason: '春秋' }, { id: 2, name: '上海', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1548919973-5cef591cdbc9', description: '感受现代都市的繁华魅力', attractions: ['外滩', '东方明珠', '豫园', '迪士尼', '南京路'], price: '2800', category: '都市游', bestSeason: '全年' }, { id: 3, name: '广州', image: guangzhouImg, description: '品味岭南文化的独特韵味', attractions: ['陈家祠', '沙面', '白云山', '广州塔', '上下九'], price: '2500', category: '美食游', bestSeason: '秋冬' }, { id: 4, name: '成都', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1545586281-7564f4d6c0a6', description: '休闲慢生活，美食与熊猫之都', attractions: ['大熊猫基地', '锦里古街', '宽窄巷子', '春熙路', '都江堰'], price: '2600', category: '美食游', bestSeason: '春秋' }, { id: 5, name: '西安', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1561387809-9117bfd0a0df', description: '穿越千年，感受古都魅力', attractions: ['兵马俑', '古城墙', '大雁塔', '回民街', '华山'], price: '2400', category: '文化游', bestSeason: '春秋' }, { id: 6, name: '三亚', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1570077188670-e3a8d69ac5ff', description: '阳光沙滩，热带天堂', attractions: ['亚龙湾', '天涯海角', '蜈支洲岛', '南山寺', '大东海'], price: '3500', category: '度假游', bestSeason: '冬春' }, { id: 7, name: '杭州', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1598887142487-3c854d51d2c7', description: '诗画江南，人间天堂', attractions: ['西湖', '灵隐寺', '宋城', '西溪湿地', '龙井村'], price: '2700', category: '文化游', bestSeason: '春秋' }, { id: 8, name: '丽江', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1552374622-47b4a89fe473', description: '古城风情，雪山圣境', attractions: ['古城', '玉龙雪山', '泸沽湖', '束河古镇', '茶马古道'], price: '3200', category: '文化游', bestSeason: '春秋' }, { id: 9, name: '青岛', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1567521464027-f127ff144326', description: '啤酒海滨，欧韵小城', attractions: ['栈桥', '八大关', '啤酒博物馆', '崂山', '五四广场'], price: '2300', category: '度假游', bestSeason: '夏秋' } ]; function Destinations() { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState('全部'); const [filteredDestinations, setFilteredDestinations] = useState(allDestinations); const [selectedDestination, setSelectedDestination] = useState(null); const [bookingInfo, setBookingInfo] = useState({ date: '', people: 1, phone: '', notes: '' }); // 搜索和筛选功能 useEffect(() => { const results = allDestinations.filter(destination => { const matchesSearch = destination.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || destination.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || destination.attractions.some(attr => attr.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())); const matchesCategory = selectedCategory === '全部' || destination.category === selectedCategory; return matchesSearch && matchesCategory; }); setFilteredDestinations(results); }, [searchTerm, selectedCategory]); const categories = ['全部', '文化游', '都市游', '美食游', '度假游']; return (

探索目的地

发现令人惊叹的旅游胜地

{categories.map(category => ( ))}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} />
{filteredDestinations.map(destination => (

{destination.name}

{destination.description}

{destination.price}
))}
{selectedDestination && (
setSelectedDestination(null)}>
e.stopPropagation()}>

预订 - {selectedDestination.name}

{selectedDestination.description}

{selectedDestination.price}

主要景点：

    {selectedDestination.attractions.map((attraction, index) => (
  • {attraction}
    • ))}
setBookingInfo({...bookingInfo, date: e.target.value})} />
setBookingInfo({...bookingInfo, people: e.target.value})} />
setBookingInfo({...bookingInfo, phone: e.target.value})} />
单价： {selectedDestination.price}
人数： × {bookingInfo.people}
预估总价： ¥{parseInt(selectedDestination.price) * bookingInfo.people}起
)}
); } export default Destinations;
